page.title: Simple Example Using Redis Increment
page.description: Redis can atomically increment an existing redis key value.

description.p: A good use case for the Redis Incr methid is a value that needs to be uniquely defined and sequential, similar to an autoincrement field in a SQL table.

section.example:
dim redis as extension::RedisClient = extension::RedisClient::CreateClient() dim hash as extension::RedisResult
redis.Set("InvoiceNumber",100) ? redis.Get("InvoiceNumber").valueInteger = 100
redis.Incr("InvoiceNumber") ? redis.Get("InvoiceNumber").valueInteger = 101
redis.Incr("InvoiceNumber") ? redis.Get("InvoiceNumber").valueInteger = 102
